channel.title: omg on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in omg on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lesson via phone
item.description: 20:16 Sunday 12 August 2018 JST Today Lin and I are at her sister’s house, but they do not have strong wifi so I cannot use Skype. At least not in this quiet room. Maybe that is why it’s quiet haha. I do not have unlimited data on my phone, but I do have unlimited calling, so I am doing a lesson via phone instead of Skype.

item.title: ate at a churrascuria
item.description: 15:40 Wednesday 27 December 2017 -02 Lin and I ate lunch with R & D and D’s auunt R and three of R’s nephews. I took the longest to eat due to chewing chewing chewing. The meat was a bit tough given that we arrived near the end of their lunch session. D drove me, Lin and his aunt R in the Range Rover, while R drove his three nephews in a rental car.

item.title: Godot coding
item.description: 17:16 Tuesday 12 December 2017 JST I may be speaking too soon, but programming in Godot is so easy I could just cry. (in terms of memory managment, auto completion, and things just working)

item.title: presentations
item.description: 07:17 Sunday 06 November 2016 JST Howdy I will be presenting at Pecha Kucha on 24 November. I hate the idea of presenting; part of me wants to cancel everything, but I hope to see some of you on Thursday November 24th at SuperDeluxe in Roppongi. https://www.pechakucha.org/cities/tokyo/events/581bfccc9831a6196b000002 Rob In other news, I’m planning to present Head Heart and Soul to anyone who wants a sense of what the men’s group work is about.

item.title: soon thereafter, at Majingos...
item.description: ##00:54 Friday 28 November 2014 JST## On my way out of Roppongi, I shook the hands of the various bar managers/owners who said hello, and I took a liking to Ken, who had white hairs in his beard. He invited me to come up just to see the place so I could come back next time. Okay; that can’t hurt, I figured, and followed him up to 6th floor of some building.
